Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.scoreboard

Class Scoreboarder

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.scoreboard.Scoreboarder
public class Scoreboarder extends Object
This class allows to create per-player scoreboards.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Scoreboarder(String title)
    Creates a scoreboard builder with provided title.

  • Constructor Details

    • Scoreboarder

      public Scoreboarder(String title)
      Creates a scoreboard builder with provided title.
      Parameters:
      title - - Title. Supports color codes.

  • Method Details

    • setTitle

      public void setTitle(String title)
      Changes current title of the scoreboard.
      Parameters:
      title - - New title. Supports color codes.

    • setLine

      public void setLine(int line, String text)
      Changes specific line of the scoreboard.
      Parameters:
      line - - index of a line.
      text - - New text.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if line is negative or greater than 17.
      NullPointerException - if line with index doesn't exist.

    • setLines

      public void setLines(String... lines)
      Removes all lines and sets new lines of the scoreboard and updates lines.
      Parameters:
      lines - - Array of new lines.

    • addLines

      public void addLines(String... lines)
      Adds lines to the scoreboard. Does NOT update scoreboard lines.
      Parameters:
      lines - - Lines to add.

    • addLine

      public void addLine(String line, Object... objects)
      Adds a line to the scoreboard. Does NOT update scoreboard lines.
      Parameters:
      line - - Line to add.
      objects - - Format replacements.

    • clearLines

      public void clearLines()
      Clears all scoreboard lines. Does NOT update scoreboard lines.

    • removeLine

      public void removeLine(int line)
      Remove line at specific index. Does NOT update scoreboard lines.
      Parameters:
      line - - index of line.

    • updateLines

      public void updateLines()
      Updates scoreboard lines, setting the values and changing their respective positions. This is only called automatically at setLines(String...) Must be called manually after adding lines using other methods.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Shows this scoreboard to provided player.
      Parameters:
      player - - Player to show scoreboard to.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Shows main scoreboard to the player, therefore hiding this scoreboard.
      Parameters:
      player - - PLayer to hide scoreboard from.

    • getPlayers

      public Set<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getPlayers()
      Returns a set of players who can see this scoreboard.
      Returns:
      a set of players who can see this scoreboard.

    • getScoreboard

      public org.bukkit.scoreboard.Scoreboard getScoreboard()
      Returns scoreboard object of this builder.
      Returns:
      scoreboard object of this builder.

    • getObjective

      public org.bukkit.scoreboard.Objective getObjective()
      Returns objective of this scoreboard.
      Returns:
      objective of this scoreboard.

    • getLines

      public List<String> getLines()
      Returns lines of this scoreboard.
